com.movlad.pcl.io

Class PointCloudReader<T extends PointCloud<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.pcl.io.PointCloudReader<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PointCloud3dReader

    public abstract class PointCloudReader<T extends PointCloud<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads PointCloud<T> instances from files (e.g. PCD, PLY)
    Author:
    Vlad-Adrian Moglan

        public final void read(java.lang.String fileName)

        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any input file path.
        format - establishes the format of the input file.

      • readPCD

        protected abstract void readPCD(java.lang.String fileName,
                                T cloud)
        Native implementation - reads a PointCloud from a PCD file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any input file path.
        cloud - is the target where all the read information is stored.

      • readPLY

        protected abstract void readPLY(java.lang.String fileName,
                                T cloud)
        Native implementation - reads a PointCloud from a PLY file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - can be any input file path.
        cloud - is the target where all the read information is stored.
